item.title: Summer - Fall 2018 Data Together Reading Group
item.description: Summer - Fall 2018 Data Together Reading Group The goal of this “syllabus” is to identify some themes that drive Data Together as a project & as a politics, and to find some readings that help us understand those themes better.
